name: 健康心理學研究
description: This course is designed to provide an overview of the primary topics in health psychology, and emphasizes psychological research approaches.  We will sample research readings from most of the main topics in the field, with an emphasis on fundamentals and current issues.  The readings are mainly basic research and reviews of basic research, with minimal treatment of applications, policy, or clinical treatment issues. Methodological rigor and theoretical perspectives will be emphasized.
goals: The readings are mainly basic research and reviews of basic research, with minimal treatment of applications, policy, or clinical treatment issues.
